Producer: Jason Shuman, Eduardo Cisneros, Luke Greenfield, Jason Benoit
Synopsis: Renato, a successful Mexican aviation executive, is shocked to discover he has an American half-brother he never knew about, the free-spirited Asher. The two very different half-brothers are forced on a road journey together masterminded by their ailing father, tracing the path their father took as an immigrant from Mexico to the US.
Title: Half Brothers
